ygData.subject: Re: Scuba Useless?
ygData.msgSnippet: Who said the Scuba will be unlimited? We have yet to see one made. ...Sincerely Cloverleaf  In a message dated 10/30/99 2:52:55 AM Eastern
ygData.messageBody:
Who said the Scuba will be unlimited? We have yet to see one made.
...Sincerely Cloverleaf <Fennin Ro Server>


In a message dated 10/30/99 2:52:55 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
gibkeeg@... writes:

<< From: gibkeeg@...

No way an unlimited charge device will be useless.



On Fri, 29 Oct 1999, Santerre, Peter (PRS) - CPC wrote:

> From: "Santerre, Peter (PRS) - CPC" <PRS@...>
>
>
> >From eq.castersrealm.com
>
> >>Dhimmid de'Thon of Bristlebane informed me that the Test Server currently
> has a spell floating around to create Water >>Stones. These apparently work
> like Rings of Flight and you just right click to get them to work. Each
> stone contains 2 >>charges of Enduring Breath. If this comes across to live
> servers (possibly as a 44 summon item spell) I can see magicians >>being
> very popular before Kedge raids.
>
> So will the scuba gear be useless? I don't know how long those endure
> breathing spells last but...
>
> Shahk Sinnoyade - Seeker of Lore
> Bertoxxulous
